code: import React,{useState}from"react";import ScheduleModal from"./ScheduleModal";import PricingModal from"./PricingModal";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CampaignTable=_ref=>{let{campaigns,updateCampaign}=_ref;const[pricingData,setPricingData]=useState(null);const calculateTimeDiff=date=>{const diff=(date-Date.now())/(1000*60*60*24);return diff>0?`${Math.ceil(diff)} days ahead`:`${Math.abs(Math.ceil(diff))} days ago`;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"campaign-table",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Date"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Campaign"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Region"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:campaigns.map(campaign=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:calculateTimeDiff(campaign.createdOn)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:campaign.image_url,alt:"campaign"}),campaign.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:campaign.region}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>updateCampaign(campaign.id),children:"Schedule Again"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setPricingData(campaign),children:"View Pricing"})]})]},campaign.id))})]}),pricingData&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PricingModal,{campaign:pricingData,onClose:()=>setPricingData(null)})]});};export default CampaignTable;
